name: RotavirusDiseaseTestsForRotavirusNucleicAcid
title: Rotavirus Disease (Tests for Rotavirus Nucleic Acid)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Rotavirus by NAA),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Rotavirus NAA),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
